title: Applicant name
question: What is the other applicant’s name?
content1: The name you give us will be written on the grant of probate.
content2: Their name should match exactly what is written on their passport or other official identification document, such as a driving licence.
content3: You should make sure that this is the same form of identification they use when they are dealing with {deceasedName}’s estate.
warningText: If the name on the grant does not match the identification they use, they may have difficulties dealing with the estate.

fullName.minLength: Name must be 2 characters or more
fullName.maxLength: Name must be 100 characters or less
